idlastro/

get_juldate.pro


top source get_juldate

get_juldate, jd

NAME: GET_JULDATE PURPOSE: Return the current Julian Date

EXPLANATION: In V5.4, GET_JULDATE became completely obsolete with the introduction of the /UTC keyword to SYSTIME(). So GET_JULDATE,jd is equivalent to jd = SYSTIME(/JULIAN,/UTC).

CALLING SEQUENCE: GET_JULDATE,jd

INPUTS: None

OUTPUTS: jd = Current Julian Date, double precision scalar

EXAMPLE: Return the current hour, day, month and year as integers

IDL> GET_JULDATE, JD ;Get current Julian date IDL> DAYCNV, JD, YR, MON, DAY, HOURS ;Convert to hour,day month & year

METHOD: A call is made to SYSTIME(/JULIAN,/UTC).

REVISION HISTORY: Written Wayne Landsman March, 1991 Converted to IDL V5.0 W. Landsman September 1997 Assume since V5.4 Use /UTC keyword to SYSTIME() W. Landsman April 2006

Parameters

jd
